meanings.definition: Leadership or dominance, especially by one country or social group over others.
meanings.sent1: The hegumeny of the principal in the school is unquestioned.
meanings.sent2: The hegumeny of the lion over the pride ensures its survival.
meanings.sent3: The hegumeny of the class clown in making everyone laugh is quite impressive.
meanings.sent4: The hegumeny of the sun in the sky dictates the rhythm of life on Earth.
meanings.sent5: The hegumeny of the queen bee in the hive keeps everything in order.

meanings.definition: The authority or control exerted by a hegemon.
meanings.sent1: The hegumeny of the CEO is felt throughout the company.
meanings.sent2: The hegumeny of the emperor was unchallenged in the ancient empire.
meanings.sent3: The hegumeny of the cat over the household pets is comical at times.
meanings.sent4: The hegumeny of technology in our lives is undeniable.
meanings.sent5: The hegumeny of the traffic lights regulates the flow of vehicles on the road.
